changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.transformation ( id bigserial NOT NULL, service bigint NOT NULL, resource bigint NOT NULL, product bigint NOT NULL, sequence_number ruleform.sequence_number NOT NULL, assign_to bigint NOT NULL, resource_key bigint NOT NULL, product_key bigint NOT NULL, relationship_key bigint NOT NULL, attribute bigint NOT NULL, product_attribute_resource bigint NOT NULL, notes character varying, research bigint, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, CONSTRAINT transformation_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT transformation_assign_to_fkey FOREIGN KEY (assign_to) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT transformation_attribute_fkey FOREIGN KEY (attribute) REFERENCES ruleform.attribute (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT transformation_product_attribute_resource_fkey FOREIGN KEY (product_attribute_resource) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT transformation_product_fkey FOREIGN KEY (product) REFERENCES ruleform.product (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT transformation_product_key_fkey FOREIGN KEY (product_key) REFERENCES ruleform.product (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT transformation_service_fkey FOREIGN KEY (service) REFERENCES ruleform.product (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT transformation_relationship_key_fkey FOREIGN KEY (relationship_key) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT transformation_resource_fkey FOREIGN KEY (resource) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT transformation_resource_key_fkey FOREIGN KEY (resource_key) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT transformation_service_key UNIQUE (service , resource , product , sequence_number ) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE );
